dmca.title: Report Abuse - Cease and Desist Orders
dmca.body:
FengSong,
 
It has been noticed that you are continously plagrizing our website content i.e http://www.theloanbazaar.com at both www.get4loan.com and now www.loansinfor.com . 
 
Remove the Content Immediately or We shall be forced to take a legal action against you and your hosting provider.
 
We have already sent many Cease and Desist orders in this regard which have been neglected by both you and the hosting provider. 
 
This shall be our Last warning to you and the Hosting Provider i.e NamesCheap.com. If the same happens again or is not corrected within due time after the recipt of this mail, Please do accept the Attorney's notice and be ready for a DMCA takedown at google and other Search Engines including a fine of $150,000 under the "Digital Millienum Copyrights Act"
 
For the Host, Supporting the website which has been plagrizing since a long time now despite several warnings to you and the owner is an offence as well and shall be dealt with legally.
 
We Expect the content to removed within 5 days, failing which, Legal Court Summon (Orders) shall be released against the registrants and the hosting providers.
 
Thanks 
Steve
The Loan Bazaar Admin
http://www.theloanbazaar.com
Webart Softech
S.C.O. 347, Sector-9,
Panchkula, India.
Ph:+91-172-5048291
Cell: +91-98159-25000
Fax: +91-172-5004291
www.webartindia.com
dmca.principal_name: Steve on behalf of Webart Softech
